name: Silver Longsword
description: A finely-crafted longsword made from pure silver.
looks: The silver longsword has a polished blade with an intricate design etched into it. The hilt is wrapped in black leather for a comfortable grip.

name: Leather Vest
description: A lightweight vest made of high-quality leather.
looks: The leather vest has a slim and form-fitting design, providing both protection and ease of movement. It is dyed a dark brown color and has intricate stitching along the edges.

name: Adamantite Sword
description: A deadly sword forged from the rare and powerful metal known as adamantite.
looks: The Adamantite Sword has a long, straight blade with a deep blue hue. The hilt is wrapped in black leather and adorned with intricate silver engravings.

special_weapon_skils.sword_skill: Increases damage dealt with swords by 20%

special_effects.critical_strike: Has a 10% chance to deal double damage on each hit.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Mithril Sword
description: A legendary sword forged from mithril, known for its incredible strength and sharpness.
looks: The Mithril Sword has a silver blade that glows with a faint blue hue. The handle is wrapped in fine leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Heavy gauntlets made from steel, providing strong protection for the hands and wrists.
looks: The steel gauntlets are made from thick steel plates. They have leather straps for securing them to the hands and wrist, and have small steel plates on the knuckles for added protection.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic iron sword suitable for beginners.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. The hilt is made of wood and wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

name: Silver Sword
description: A shiny silver sword with a sharp blade.
looks: The silver sword has a polished blade made of pure silver. The hilt is made of leather and has a silver crossguard.

name: Steel Sword
description: A well-crafted sword made of high-quality steel.
looks: The steel sword has a straight blade with a sharp edge, perfect for slicing through enemies. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skills.sword_skill: Grants a bonus to Sword skill when wielded.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Steel Sword
description: A strong and durable sword made from steel.
looks: The steel sword has a long, straight blade with a sharp edge. It has a simple hilt with a leather-wrapped grip and a steel pommel.

name: Staff of Fire
description: A powerful magical staff imbued with fire magic.
looks: The Staff of Fire is made from a polished oak wood, with intricate carvings along the length of the staff. At the top, a large ruby is embedded, glowing with a fiery red light.

special_weapon_skills.fire_magic: Increases the proficiency in fire magic spells.

special_effects.fireball: Has a chance to cast a fireball spell when attacking.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword with a sharp blade.
looks: The iron sword has a straight and narrow blade, with a hilt made of leather wrapped around the handle. The blade is engraved with intricate patterns.

name: Silver Dagger
description: A small dagger made from pure silver, perfect for quickly dispatching enemies.
looks: The silver dagger has a short, slender blade with a silver sheen. The hilt is wrapped in black leather for a secure grip.
